description:
From solo SUP sessions to pool parties, this retro halter style top will keep you covered and comfy. Made using recycled materials and loaded with little details, the Taranto stands out in a sea of strappy bikinis.

  • High-neck halter silhouette provides more sun coverage
  • Made from a quick-drying blend of stretchy LYCRA® XTRA LIFE™ spandex and ECONYL® nylon
  • ECONYL nylon is made from fishnets, carpet fluff and pre-consumer nylon waste
  • LYCRA XTRA LIFE spandex is a treated spandex that fights fading, resists chlorine degradation and holds it shape longer, so a washing machine won’t wreck your swimsuit
  • UPF50+ blocks more than 98% or harsh UV
  • Under-bust band and adjustable back hook closure offer a little extra support
  • Adjustable straps let you find the perfect fit
name: Prana Taranto Top - Women's
